      • banPlayer

        public boolean banPlayer(decoworld.model.User player,
                int duration,
                java.lang.String reason)
        Bans the given Player for the given duration, in hours, and returns whether the action was successful. Level 2 moderators can ban up to a week. Higher level moderators may ban for longer.
        Parameters:
        player - Instance of User Class.
        duration - The duration to ban the Player for, in hours.
        reason - An explanation of why the ban was given. (Can be empty string)
        Returns:
        Whether the action was successful.

      • unBanPlayer

        public boolean unBanPlayer(decoworld.model.User player)
        Un-bans the given Player and returns whether the action was successful.
        Parameters:
        player - Instance of User Class.
        Returns:
        Whether the action was successful.

      • exilePlayer

        public boolean exilePlayer(decoworld.model.User player,
                  int[] location,
                  int duration)
        Prevents the Player from entering the given location, for the given duration, in hours, and returns whether the action was successful.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to exile.
        location - The location from which to exile the Player.
        duration - The duration to exile the Player for, in hours.
        Returns:
        Whether the action was successful.

      • unExilePlayer

        public boolean unExilePlayer(decoworld.model.User player,
                    int[] location)
        Allows the Player to re-enter the given location and returns whether the action was successful.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to un-exile.
        location - The location to allow the player to re-enter.
        Returns:
        Whether the action was successful.

      • findPlayer

        public int[] findPlayer(decoworld.model.User player)
        Tries to find the given Player and returns their location coordinates. If the given Player doesn't exist, or is offline, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to find.
        Returns:
        The given Player's location coordinates.

      • warpToPlayer

        public boolean warpToPlayer(decoworld.model.User player)
        Tries to teleport the Player to the given Player's location and returns whether the action was successful.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to which to teleport the Player.
        Returns:
        Whether the action was successful.

      • setPrivilegeLevel

        public boolean setPrivilegeLevel(decoworld.model.User player,
                        int privilegeLevel)
        If privilege level is 4 or higher, a player's privilege level can be changed.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to promote or demote.
        privilegeLevel - The privilege level to set for the player. See top of file/wiki for explanation.
        Returns:
        The list of reported Players.
